artist: Artist: Pat Hui; Author: Nalan Singde
creditline: Gift of funds from Virginia Kremen in memory of Dr. Arnold Kremen
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: two images with Chinese text on small left image and English translation at right; roughly horizontal bands of color with mountain-like metallic accents--yellow, brown, black, purples, greens
dimension:
13 7/8 x 8 3/8 in. (35.24 x 21.27 cm) (image, left image)
13 7/8 x 19 3/8 in. (35.24 x 49.21 cm) (image, right image)
20 x 39 15/16 in. (50.8 x 101.44 cm) (mount)
medium: Watercolor and metallic ink pen on paper
title: Wood falling on the river Wu, from a set of 24 poems
